description:
CARS COME TO CITY FRIENDS!
From now on you can add cars to your city! You can get armor truck for you Treasury, supply truck for you Supply Storage and you can get stunning custom-designed cars for your citizens!

Armor truck will collect money from all your buildings, one by one - no more spending time on tapping each house.
Supply truck will deliver supplies to your businesses and also it will pick up supplies from your factories when they are ready! No more spoiled supplies!

Buy cars for your citizens so that they will be able to get to restaurants and shops faster! The faster they get to the commerce - the faster commerce will grow and the sooner it will bring you money!

------------------------------------------

New awesome Thanksgiving buildings, costumes and decorations! Limited time offer - don't miss it! Come and check them out!

------------------------------------------------


IF YOU LOST SOME BUILDINGS IN YOUR CITY TRY TO LOGIN INTO PLUS+ NETWORK

—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

Build, customize, and grow your own city in City Friends! Design the city of your dreams with restaurants, parks, neighborhoods, and businesses. As a City Friends mayor you will grow your city's population and income, and trade with your friends to help your cities thrive.

City Friends is FREE to play, and includes FREE regular updates to keep your city fresh with new buildings.

Play alone or invite your friends as neighbors so they can see the city you've built, and help your city grow. Advance in City Friends to unlock new buildings to continue to customize your city.
releaseNotes:
- Fix crush during settings and market update
- Fix issue with negative coins
- User interface improvements
- Stability improvements
- Fix issue with some textures on early 4.x iOS versions
